basics.name: Dwight Doane
basics.label: JavaScript && Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Dwight Doane is a passionate web developer with a love for all things JavaScript.

work.summary: Helped rewrite an aging php application using modern technologies: React, Redux w/middleware (redux-observables, redux-saga)
highlights: Learned a lot about structuring a react/redux application
Learned the basics of observables with rxjs

work.summary: Worked with designers, DBAs, and stakeholders to build frontend applications like http://gogreenback.com.
highlights: Used Angular.js to build gogreenback's webapp, and webviews for the iOS/android app
Used backbone.js to build an early company website
Used Node.js and Angular.js to build a client dashboard

work.summary: 'HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Node.js, Responsive Design, Heroku, Git, User Authentication, PHP frameworks like Laravel, React.js, MySQL, MongoDB, and more.*' Shared my experiences and knowledge with students. Helped them learn a wide range of topics. Graded their homework and provided inclass and virtual assistance.
highlights: When possible I gave extracurricular lectures and activities to expose students to topics I thought they needed to know. Such as es6 features and functional programming techniques not covered in the curriculum as well as git fundamentals

work.summary: I was responsible for setting up test automation, as well as load testing apis. From setting up unit testing for React components, and End to End testing some user flows.

volunteer.summary: The technology club brought students together to explore new areas of technology and computer sciences. Topics ranged from git and programming, to cyber security and hacking.
highlights: Built the first website with a fellow club member who was a web designer
Gave an intro to git and github.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Dean's List. These students completed at least 6 credit hours, and earned between a 3.50 and 3.74 grade point average in all coursework. http://valenciacollege.edu/students/deanslist/spring2015.cfm.

publications.name: blog
publications.summary: Working on my side hustle. Where I write about my expiernces hacking on personal projects.
